sourcesContent:
import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function FlightDetails() { const { state } = useLocation(); const { flight } = state || {}; if (!flight) return
No flight data found.
; return (

Flight Details

{/* -------------------------------- */} {/* 1️⃣ SUMMARY CARD (LIKE HOMEPAGE) */} {/* -------------------------------- */}
{flight.airline} {flight.flightNo}
{flight.from} → {flight.to}
{flight.depart}
{flight.from}
{flight.durationMin} min
{flight.stops === 0 ? "Nonstop" : `${flight.stops} stop(s)`}
{flight.arrive}
{flight.to}
${flight.price}
★ {flight.rating}
{flight.amenities.wifi && WiFi} {flight.amenities.meals && Meals} {flight.amenities.entertainment && Entertainment} {flight.amenities.chargingPorts && Charging Ports}
{/* -------------------------------- */} {/* 2️⃣ AIRPORT & ROUTE INFORMATION */} {/* -------------------------------- */}

Airport & Route Information

From: {flight.fromFull} ({flight.from})

Address: {flight.fromFullAddress}

Terminal: {flight.terminalFrom}

Gate: {flight.gateFrom}

To: {flight.toFull} ({flight.to})

Address: {flight.toFullAddress}

Terminal: {flight.terminalTo}

Gate: {flight.gateTo}

Baggage Claim: {flight.baggageClaim}

Departure Time (Local): {flight.departureTimeLocal}

Arrival Time (Local): {flight.arrivalTimeLocal}

Time Zone Difference: {flight.timezoneChange}

{flight.stops > 0 && ( <>

Stopovers

{flight.stopInfo.map((stop, i) => (

Stop {i + 1}: {stop.fullName} ({stop.code})

Location: {stop.address}

Duration: {stop.durationMin} minutes

))} )}
{/* -------------------------------- */} {/* 3️⃣ BAGGAGE INFORMATION */} {/* -------------------------------- */}

Baggage Information

Carry-On Bags Allowed: {flight.carryOnBagsAllowed}

Carry-On Weight Limit: {flight.carryOnWeightLimitKg} kg

Personal Item Allowed: {flight.personalItemAllowed ? "Yes" : "No"}

Checked Bags Allowed: {flight.checkedBagsAllowed}

Checked Bag Weight Limit: {flight.checkedBagWeightLimitKg} kg

Extra Bag Fee: ${flight.extraBagFeeUSD}

{/* -------------------------------- */} {/* 4️⃣ AIRCRAFT INFORMATION */} {/* -------------------------------- */}

Aircraft Information

Model: {flight.aircraftModel}

Registration Code: {flight.aircraftCode}

Aircraft Age: {flight.aircraftAgeYears} years

Capacity: {flight.aircraftCapacity} seats

Seat Layout: {flight.seatLayout}

Seat Pitch: {flight.seatPitch}

Seat Width: {flight.seatWidth}

USB Outlets: {flight.hasUSBOutlets ? "Yes" : "No"}

Power Outlets: {flight.hasPowerOutlets ? "Yes" : "No"}

Live TV: {flight.hasLiveTV ? "Yes" : "No"}

{/* -------------------------------- */} {/* 5️⃣ PERFORMANCE & RELIABILITY */} {/* -------------------------------- */}

Performance & Reliability

On-Time Percentage: {flight.onTimePercentage}%

Average Delay: {flight.averageDelayMin} minutes

Cancellation Rate: {flight.cancellationRate}%

Weather Delay Risk Score: {flight.weatherDelayRiskScore} / 5

Safety Score: {flight.safetyScore} / 5

{/* -------------------------------- */} {/* 6️⃣ BOOKING BOX */} {/* -------------------------------- */}

Total Price: ${flight.price}

); } /* -------------------------------- */ /* STYLES */ /* -------------------------------- */ const styles = { page: { fontFamily: "system-ui, sans-serif", color: "#111", }, hero: { background: "#f6f7fbce", padding: "30px 0", borderRadius: "20px", width: "1200px", margin: "20px auto", boxShadow: "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)", }, heroInner: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center", gap: 25, }, title: { fontSize: 28, fontWeight: 700, }, summaryCard: { width: "1100px", background: "white", border: "1px solid #e7ebf0", borderRadius: 12, padding: 16, boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.04)", }, summaryRow: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1.4fr 1fr 1fr 1fr auto", gap: 20, alignItems: "center", }, summaryAirline: { fontWeight: 700, fontSize: 16 }, subtext: { fontSize: 13, color: "#666" }, time: { fontWeight: 700, fontSize: 20 }, price: { fontWeight: 800, fontSize: 20 }, badge: { fontSize: 12, background: "#eef3ff", color: "#2f6feb", padding: "2px 6px", borderRadius: 6, marginLeft: 6, }, amenitiesRow: { marginTop: 10, display: "flex", gap: 10, }, amenity: { fontSize: 12, background: "#f3f4f6", padding: "5px 10px", borderRadius: 6, color: "#444", }, separator: { margin: "15px 0", border: "none", borderBottom: "1px solid #ddd", }, sectionCard: { width: "1100px", background: "white", border: "1px solid #e7ebf0", borderRadius: 12, padding: 20, boxShadow: "0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.05)", }, bookBox: { width: "1100px", background: "white", border: "1px solid #d4d8e0", borderRadius: 12, padding: 24, textAlign: "center", boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.05)", }, bookBtn: { marginTop: 12, height: 46, background: "#2f6feb", border: "none", color: "white", width: "100%", borderRadius: 8, fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 700, cursor: "pointer", }, };
